{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$458.5K in 2021-2022** on contracts with EXACT LEGAL TRANSLATIONS.

Across 23 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (22%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 121% and the average number of amendments was 1.2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$866.0K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.84 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$309.0K. The longest contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.1M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [EXACT LEGAL TRANSLATIONS INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22EXACT%20LEGAL%20TRANSLATIONS%20INC.%22)
- [Exact Legal Translations Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Exact%20Legal%20Translations%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
